name: CVE-2017-0108
description: The Windows Graphics Component in Microsoft Office 2007 SP3; 2010 SP2; and Word Viewer; Skype for Business 2016; Lync 2013 SP1; Lync 2010; Live Meeting 2007; Silverlight 5; Windows Vista SP2; Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1; and Windows 7 SP1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web site, aka "Graphics Component Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This vulnerability is different from that described in CVE-2017-0014.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word_viewer:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:live_meeting:2007:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2010:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2007:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2010:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:silverlight:5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2013:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:skype_for_business:2016:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
